body.p:
Department of the Ohio,
Branch Office, Adjutant General's Department,
Lexington, Kentucky, March 19th, 1864

5 The resignation of 1st Lieutenant John C. Ball H. Q. M. 48th Ky. Vol. Infantry is hereby accepted, to take effect March 20th, 1864, with the condition that he shall recieve no final payments until he has satisfied the Pay Department that he is in no wise indebted to the Government.

By Command of Major General Schofield:
J. Bates Dickson
Assistant Adjutant General.

40th Infy.
Ball Jno. C.
R. Q. M.
Order accepting Resignation
Recd A. G. O March 23 1864
